Question
========

70% of Dutch women aged 16 to 30 have followed a diet in the followed a diet in the past year. Suppose you do a sample survey with 267 Dutch women of this age. What is the probability that at least 75% of them have been on a diet?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,02
* 0,04
* 0,30
* 0,70
* 0,97

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.02: Incorrect
* 0.04: Correct
* 0.30: Incorrect
* 0.70: Incorrect
* 0.97: Incorrect
